Detailed Description

Base class for Binder interfaces.

When defining a new interface, you must derive it from IInterface.

Member Function Documentation

IBinder* gaia::core::IInterface::asBinder ( )

Retrieve the Binder object associated with this interface.

You must use this instead of a plain cast, so that proxy objects can return the correct result.

const IBinder* gaia::core::IInterface::asBinder ( ) const

Retrieve the Binder object associated with this interface.

You must use this instead of a plain cast, so that proxy objects can return the correct result.
